snippet: The executive director of the Major League Baseball Players Association says that Pete Rose should be in the Hall of Fame even though he gambled on baseball games.
abstract: The executive director of the Major League Baseball Players Association says that Pete Rose should be in the Hall of Fame even though he gambled on baseball games.

headline.main: Rose Should Be in Hall of Fame, Leader of Union Says
headline.print_headline: Rose Belongs in Hall of Fame, Leader of Union Maintains
